name: Goal and Crossbones (LD41)
description:
Playing soccer with your own head is a mess.

VVVVControlsVVVV

WASD or arrows to run and aim the ball

Space to kick

R to restart

Esc to quit

VVVVCreditsVVVV

Retrosaur- Design, art, coding

Riapos- Music, additional design

@stevenjmiller- A genius name idea

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41
